snippet: Twenty-one people in 12 states have been sickened with salmonella linked to the chia powder, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention issue warning to consumers who eat chia powder; twenty-one people in 12 states have been sickened with salmonella linked to powder, which is made from ground chia seeds and often added to smoothies and other foods for health benefits.
lead_paragraph: Twenty-one people in 12 states have been sickened with salmonella linked to the chia powder, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said.

headline.main: Chia Powder Is Linked to Salmonella
headline.print_headline: Chia Powder Is Linked to Salmonella

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
